flavor_text: When its body temperature goes up it turns into steam and vanishes. When its temperature lowers it returns to ice.
They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice freezing the prey at -148F.
